config.siddhiApp: @App:name('DeveloperSignupsSiddhi') @primaryKey('SUBSCRIBER_ID') @store(type="rdbms" , datasource="AM_DB") define table AM_SUBSCRIBER(SUBSCRIBER_ID int,USER_ID string,TENANT_ID int,EMAIL_ADDRESS string,DATE_SUBSCRIBED string,CREATED_BY string,CREATED_TIME string,UPDATED_BY string,UPDATED_TIME string);

queryData.totalQuery: from AM_SUBSCRIBER select count(SUBSCRIBER_ID) as totalCount
queryData.weekQuery: from AM_SUBSCRIBER on CREATED_TIME >= '{{weekStart}}' select count(SUBSCRIBER_ID) as weekCount;
